Subskills.name: Frozen Chain Rip
Subskills.description: Freezing chain shot now chains and pulls chained monsters towards the first target.

Subskills.name: Good Ol' Ways
Subskills.description: Gain additional attacks per second while wielding a bow.

Subskills.name: Pack a Punch
Subskills.description: Increases the projectile speed of freezing chain shot.

Subskills.name: Shatter
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to frozen targets.

Subskills.name: Ice Age
Subskills.description: Freezes enemies with a chance on striking to deepfreeze them.

Subskills.name: Ice Healing
Subskills.description: Restores a flat amount of health and mana on hit.

Subskills.name: Freezing Whiplash
Subskills.description: When hitting terrain the chainshot spins and grows in size rapidly sending monsters into the air dealing increased damage and stunning them.

Subskills.name: Gulf Stream
Subskills.description: Chance on hit to increase your attackspeed for a short duration.

Subskills.name: Grip Boots
Subskills.description: Decreases the movement diminish when using freezing chain shot.

Subskills.name: Coldspot
Subskills.description: Freezing chain shot deals damage in a small area around the targets hit.

Subskills.name: Coldsnap Vacuum
Subskills.description: Fire a huge chainshot catching monsters on its way and dealing increased damage and stunning caught monsters when hitting terrain.

Subskills.name: Catch of the Day
Subskills.description: On hit release additional chain shots in all directions.
